Package Server

Server classes for the MEME generator application Package contains Server class that uses thread poll to handle client request, WorkerRunnable class that handles one specific request and DB class that sends SQL requests to database.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DB
    Class capable of establishing connection with database, sending sql requests and returning values retrieved from DB
    Server
    Runnable server class which uses thread pool to handle incoming requests
    WorkerRunnable
    Runnable worker class that handles 1 request

Package Server Description

Server classes for the MEME generator application

Package contains Server class that uses thread poll to handle client request, WorkerRunnable class that handles one specific request and DB class that sends SQL requests to database.
